kalayakata passe denna wiwaha wenna thiranaya karala thibune.ee uthsawayath ganna meya adahas karanne ee palathema thiyena hondama hotale.samanya pawulak wechcha sunitha me karanna yana wade gana samanta therumak thibuna nisa gedara uthsawaya ganna akkawa kamathi karawagaththa.samange yaluwo wechcha apita kisi aaradhanawak kale naththe api iskole yana kollo nisa wenna athi.upadhi deke wenasa theruma ganna bari api wage matto sunithage magulata sahabhagi karawaganna lajja hithenna athi.ee kalenam apita hithune wenath hethuwak.

mama danna widihata prasiddha sthanawala lingika awayawa penwima lankawe nithiyata anuwa waradak.ee nisa nithiyata anuwa owunta danduwamak labiya yuthuyi.eeth minissu nithiya athata gannawata wada ee manussayawa polisiyata bara dena eka thamayi honda.polisiye kriyapatipatiye ee minissunwa mano waidyawarayekuta yomu kirima kiyana piyawarath athi.ara kattiya kiyala thiyena widihata me wage ayawa waidyawarayekuta yomu karana eka kochchiye yana ena ayata prayogikawa karanda amaruyi.ee pudgalaya danna andurana aya innawanan ee ayage yuthukama thamayi ee pudgalayawa ehema thanakata yomu karana eka.kalin lipiya gana echcharayi.ano koment gana kiyanawanam ano koment thibima mama hithanne athyawashya deyak.kawuruwath tharahakara gannathuwa aththa kelin kiyanda honda widihak thamayi ano ena eka.habayi ithin eeka wena katahari apahasa karanda pawichchi karana eka therumak na.kawuru hari ano awith pissu natanawa kiyala anola okkoma waradi kiyana eka hariyata ekek ellila mala kiyala fesbuk wahanda katha karanawa wage wadak.pa.li.ano gana mehema kiwwata mama ano enne nomathi bawa karunawen salakanna.blog lokaye dethun denek ara kisiwekuth ma pudgalikawa handunanne natha.enisa mage profayil eken pamina koment kirima gana mata gataluwak natha.pa.pa.liblogwala kunuharupayayi sammatha wadan bhawitha kirima nusudusuyayi mama wishwasa karanawa.blog kiyanne hamotama balanda puluwan samajiya sthanayakne.aawega pita karanda shishta wadan pawichchi karamu.naththan apith parlimenthu manthrila, palath sabha manthrila ganata watenawa.
